title: Workshop on Integrating Police Education Theory and Practice: Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A customized instructional design competency enhancement program for adult learners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more instructional design strategies that connect theory and practice.
Learners will develop one or more learning scenarios reflecting real police work situations in simulation/VR environments.
Learners provide feedback that improves the practicality and educational effectiveness of designed instructional activities by over 80% through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
